com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.transaction

Class SCUITransactionContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.transaction.SCUITransactionContextFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISCUISessionAware, ISCUITransactionContextFactory

    public class SCUITransactionContextFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISCUITransactionContextFactory
    This class represents transaction context factory which would act in-line with existing transaction management system (platform afc). Internally this class relies on APIManager for transaction management. asmishra

    • Method Detail

      • createTransactionContext

        public ISCUITransactionContext createTransactionContext(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method creates a transaction context (SCUITransactionContext) instance. An environment is created using APIManager#login(HttpServletRequest) and is set as a transaction object on the transaction context. uiContext transaction context of type SCUITransactionContext
        Specified by:
        createTransactionContext in interface ISCUITransactionContextFactory
